definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker
old variant of 閘|闸[zha2]/sluice/lock (on waterway)

sentences.english: She could fly because of the intake of the pills.
sentences.chinese: 由于药片的进水闸，她可能飞行。

sentences.english: Supply and install clarifier sludge outlet sluice valves.
sentences.chinese: 供应及安装净化污泥出路水闸阀门。

sentences.english: If this book is allowed to be published the floodgates will open.
sentences.chinese: 如果这本书被允许出版，水闸将被放开。

sentences.english: Up ahead appeared something like a sluice gate, straddling the tracks.
sentences.chinese: 前方出现了一个大水闸似的建筑，拦腰横跨在铁道上。

sentences.english: Supply and install clarifier recycling sluice valves.
sentences.chinese: 供应及安装净化回收水闸阀门。

sentences.english: Excess water will drain through sluices into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 过剩的水将会通过水闸排放到海里去。

sentences.english: The causation and the suggestion to deal with the settlement in escape gate are analyzed .
sentences.chinese: 分析了退水闸沉降的原因，并提出了处理措施。

sentences.english: The tiered management of sluices shall be determined in project filing of sluice construction.
sentences.chinese: 水闸的分级管理，在水闸建设立项时予以确定。

sentences.english: The tiered management of sluices shall be determined in project filing of sluice construction.
sentences.chinese: 水闸的分级管理，在水闸建设立项时予以确定。

sentences.english: The dam of Luchao port, Nanhui County, is situated in the southeast of Shanghai City, facing the East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 南汇县芦潮港水闸位于上海市东南角，面临东海。

sentences.english: The application of the PLC in the automation system of sluices, which are in the hydroelectric plant is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了PLC在水电厂泄水闸门控制系统中的应用。

sentences.english: It rained as if the flood-gates of Heaven were opened.
sentences.chinese: 雨倾盆而下，犹如天上的水闸打开了。

sentences.english: Harris was sweating and cursing by the time they reached the lock.
sentences.chinese: 当他们来到水闸时，哈里斯已是汗流浃背，骂不绝口。

sentences.english: Water went rushing through the lock gates.
sentences.chinese: 水流经水闸时十分流急。

sentences.english: On Monday evening, more than 1,400 vessels remained stuck at a lock.
sentences.chinese: 周日晚上，超过1400艘船被困在一个水闸。

sentences.english: It does seem to open the floodgates.
sentences.chinese: 这确实像是打开了水闸。

definition: gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker
old variant of 閘|闸[zha2]/sluice/lock (on waterway)
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
